attributes.action: instruct the Secretary of State for Transport to support the reduction in speed limit on Clingoe Hill (A133), Colchester to 50 mph and the introduction of street lighting on this dangerous stretch of road immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the last 10 months 2 students have been killed in road traffic accidents on an unlit stretch of road bordering the campus of the University of Essex.  There have been a number of other fatalities and injuries in the time before that.

The University students and staff have been requesting safety measures here for a number of years and have been told a number of times that the proposed measures will cost "too much money".

This is not acceptable.

Please add your names to the petition in support of our drive for safety.

Many thanks

University of Essex Students' Union

government_responses.details:
